name: Swallow Smuggler
description:
Swallow Smuggler ------------------------🕊 Overview🕊---------------------

You are the most famous smuggler in the city of Esmeralda. Your job is delivering dangerous parcels to all corners of the city on time. 

To reach the destination as soon as possible, you will run through the buildings of the city and avoid obstacles and dangers. 

Good smugglers are often explorers. There are also many routes for you to reach your destinations. Keep exploring and you will find surprises every time.

----------------------- 🎮Control🎮----------------------

WASD to move

Space bar to Jump and Climb

Left Ctrl to slide

--------------------------📃Info📃-------------------------

Name: Jingwei Wu

DATT3300-LAB-01
